subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Greipel, a German rider, won the rain-drenched second stage of the Tour in a sprint finish on Sunday, while the defending champion, Vincenzo Nibali, lost valuable time after dropping behind the front group.
snippet: Greipel, a German rider, won the rain-drenched second stage of the Tour in a sprint finish on Sunday, while the defending champion, Vincenzo Nibali, lost valuable time after dropping behind the front group.
